notifications.title: Tuition Fee Reminder
notifications.content: Pay your tuition fee before Dec 1st.
notifications.details: Please complete your tuition fee payment by December 1st, 2024. Late payments will incur a penalty. For payment instructions, visit the student portal or contact the Finance Department.

notifications.title: Exam Schedule Released
notifications.content: Check the portal for the latest exam schedule.
notifications.details: The final exam schedule for all subjects has been published. Please check the exam schedule portal to view your exam dates and times.

news.title: New Semester Starts!
news.details: The new semester will officially start on August 15th, 2024. Make sure to review your course schedule and prepare your materials in advance.

news.title: Library Open Hours
news.content: Library hours extended during exam period.
news.details: During the exam period, the library will be open until 10 PM every day.
